title: Linux unset Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the unset command in Linux, learn how to unset environment variables and shell functions, and apply practical examples to enhance your system configuration and settings.

meta.title: Linux unset Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the unset command in Linux, learn how to unset environment variables and shell functions, and apply practical examples to enhance your system configuration and settings.
meta.keywords: Linux, unset command, environment variables, shell functions, system configuration, settings

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of the unset Command

verify.name: Verify environment variable unset
verify.hint: The `MY_VAR` environment variable should be unset after running the provided commands.

verify.name: Verify environment variables unset
verify.hint: All the environment variables (VAR1, VAR2, VAR3) should be unset after running the provided commands.

verify.name: Verify shell function unset
verify.hint: The `my_function` shell function should be unset after running the provided commands.
